jump_scares.spoiler: The girl attempts to make a phone call but is interupted by the guy who says “What are you doing?” from right behind her
The guy once again startles the girl, this time by saying “hey” from behind her
The guy puts his hand down the back of the seat and suddenly starts screaming (as a joke)
The guy sees some hands in the ice
The guy sees a frozen corpse
The girl puts her hand on the back of a figure walking the other direction but quickly withdraws as he is very cold to the touch. The man then turns around to reveal a grossly deformed face
Someone knocks on the car door
A car window is smashed and the girl is pulled out of the car. [Video]
The girl suddenly sits up in the back seat
The girl sees some bare feet in front of her as she crawls through the snow
The policeman jumps out of the burning car and tries to attack the girl and the truck driver
The policeman is suddenly standing beside the truck as the girl tries to call for help
